name: Jump Monster
description:
one of the most addictive games of all time !!
Jump Monster is a game that challenges your skills.

many fantastic worlds to play and have fun.

how to play, use the buttons on the sides and jump to move, grab the donuts to get more points and go up to the next level.
if you make the purchase and it does not work please contact us.

thanks for downloading Jump Monster and have a great game
